He met my mother through his sister.
She introduced him to somebody suitable presumably.
No, as a child he visited them and found my mother as a child and he was ten years older
and he said to my grandmother then, my mother's mother, I'll come back for Becky because she was young as a little girl.
And he must have said it in a sort of joke but it came true.
Wonderful story. So how old were they when they did marry?
Well, my parents, my mother was 23, I think, and my father was ten years older.
